This formula rewards active players. If: This formula rewards active players. If you have positive points but play very few games, your score is reduced. If you play more than average, your score is boosted.

We apply technical and organizational me: We apply technical and organizational measures appropriate to the risk, including authentication and role-based access controls. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.
We collect the following types of inform: We collect the following types of information:
We do not engage in automated decision-m: We do not engage in automated decision-making producing legal or similarly significant effects. Rankings and ELO calculations are automated scoring features within the Service.
We implement security measures to protec: We implement security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
We may suspend or terminate your access: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Service at any time if we believe you violated these Terms or applicable law.
We may suspend or terminate your account: We may suspend or terminate your account if you breach these Terms or our policies.
We may terminate or suspend your account: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms and Conditions.
We may update our Privacy Policy from ti: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
We may update these Terms from time to t: We may update these Terms from time to time. Material changes will be notified within the Service. Continued use after changes means you accept the updated Terms.
We may update this Privacy Policy from t: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Material changes will be notified within the Service. Continued use after changes means you acknowledge the updated Policy.
We reserve the right, at our sole discre: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.
We retain personal data for as long as n: We retain personal data for as long as necessary to provide the Service, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Usage records (e.g., match history) may be retained in anonymized or aggregated form.
We use cookies and similar technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies for strictly necessary purposes (e.g., login), and‚Äîonly with your consent‚Äîfor analytics and advertising. You can manage or withdraw consent at any time via the Cookie Settings link (if available) or by adjusting your browser settings.
we use Firebase Authentication, Firestor: we use Firebase Authentication, Firestore, Storage, and related Google Cloud services to host and store data. Data is primarily processed in europe-west1 (Belgium) for Firestore/Functions; Storage may use multi-region configurations.
We use third-party services such as Fire: We use third-party services such as Firebase (Google Cloud) for hosting and data storage and Google Analytics for analytics. Your use of the Service is also subject to those providers‚Äô terms and policies where applicable.
We use your data for the following purpo: We use your data for the following purposes:
We will retain your Personal Data only f: We will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
